sentences.sContent: When the water boils add the meat and the cabbage.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the water boils add the meat and the cabbage.
sentences.sCn: 水开时加入肉和洋白菜。

phrases.pCn: 大白菜泡菜；醋渍甘蓝菜

remMethod.val: cab(出租车) ＋ bag(包) ＋ e → 包辆出租车运输卷心菜 → 卷心菜

trans.tranOther: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves
